trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected"> </xref> gli eventi del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartConnectionsEventHandler class defines a handler delegate for two events that occur on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control: the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> event.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartConnectionsEventHandler definisce un delegato del gestore per due eventi che si verificano nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo: il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>evento e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The method that handles the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo che gestisce il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>evento è il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>

trans-unit.source: The method that handles the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> event is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo che gestisce il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>evento è il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>

trans-unit.source: In both cases, the event data are contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: In entrambi i casi, i dati dell'evento sono contenuti un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs>
